sentences: Greig Andrew Nori (born November 21, 1962) is a producer and musician from Sault Ste.
In 2007, Greig went back to the studio to produce for the pop punk bands Cauterize and Hedley, for their albums Disguises and Famous Last Words, respectively.
He is currently signed as producer by Nettwerk.
Since 2008, Nori is featured as the Musical guru on the show DisBAND.
